boat.name: Jabberwocky
boat.place_built: Fyne Boats Training Centre, Gatebeck, nr Kendal
boat.full_description:
Jabberwocky is owned by Arnside Sailing Club. She was the first Gaffling 4.1 dinghy to be built from a Fyne Boats kit. She was built by three teenagers, who went on a training course to build her at Fyne Boats Training Centre at Gatebeck, near Kendal in Summer 2022 with help from other club volunteers and finished off in the Club's boat park.

Jabberwocky was funded by a grant from the OGA Youth Fund and from the National Lottery Heritage Fund grant to restore Severn, which was built by Crossfields of Arnside 1912 as an entry level boat to gaff rigged sailing for adults and youths before moving onto Severn. Including sails she cost Â£7000 to build
